text: Fifty-four percent of patients with cervical diameter $\leq 4$ cm who underwent radical surgery also received adjuvant external pelvic irradiation (total dose : 50.4 Gy over 5-6 weeks).Among patients with cervical diameter $\leq 4 \ \mathrm { c m } ,$ pelvic or distant relapses were observed in $1 3 \%$ of patients who underwent radical surgery alone and in $1 8 \%$ of patients who received radiotherapy after a median follow-up of 87 months.
